content: this versatile piece is so simple it can be made in a weekend and is a quick and simple pattern worn one way it is a shawlette and by turning the point to the front and wrapping around your neck is a great fall look when paired with a pair of jeans and jean jacket this pattern works exceptionally well with a self striping yarn like magic light by ice yarns or ice yarns wool/acrylic blend variegated gauge is not important so just match your hook with your yarn and off you go us terms used
